main.description: A declaration of a professional portfolio profile.

displayName.description: The display name of the professional or entity.

description.description: A detailed professional summary, bio, or statement.

avatar.description: A profile picture or logo. Recommended to be a square image.

aspectRatio.description: Recommended aspect ratio for the image. For a square image, width and height would be equal (e.g., 1:1).

width.description: The width component of the aspect ratio (e.g., 1 for a square).

height.description: The height component of the aspect ratio (e.g., 1 for a square).

headline.description: A short professional headline or tagline.

websiteUrl.description: Link to the user's primary website, portfolio, or professional page.

contactEmail.description: A contact email address for professional inquiries.

country.description: The country where the professional is primarily based or operates from.

skills.description: A list of key skills, technologies, or areas of expertise.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the portfolio profile was created or last significantly updated.
